duties_responsibilities.duty: Management of employee FMLA, LOA, PTO, COBRA, and associated duties.
Ensuring compliance with all local, state, and federal regulations regarding leave management.
Liaising with the payroll department for all paid leaves.
Supervising a team of 5 Leave Administrators.
Implementing various leave process improvement measures.
Process timely responses to all employees regarding leave matters.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related discipline.
